channel.title: Need help with making shop in allstar source
channel.description: - Allstar-Scape v1 - .. Online! Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: " 1000" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:131) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:31) at server.main(server.java:29) i get that when i do everything rite compile allstar v2 turn it on it shows that sum one help me it wont let anyone log in because of that please tell me how to fix it[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 11, 2009, 08:06:00 pm[/size][hr]please somone help me

item.title: Need help with making shop in allstar source
item.dc:creator: @boma boma
item.description:
@boma wrote:

hm…i use spaces omf tysvm m8
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 11, 2009, 08:13:38 pm[/size][hr]i yused tabs but now it appears before it says allstar is online [br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 11, 2009, 08:17:58 pm[/size][hr]ok i found where u put the wrong thing its in my autospawn.cfg but i dont knwo where to put it (im making a shop for the ownerzone i made)
